Docs.summary: Represents a delegate that can execute any method in managed code that is declared void and takes no parameters.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> provides a simple delegate that is used to invoke a method with a void parameter list. This delegate can be used when making calls to a control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> method, or when you need a simple delegate but do not want to define one yourself.
